text: allah tahanam kala atmayak yuktiyakin tora va numbala ghatanaya nokaranu. tavada kavareku aparadha karanu læbuvaku lesin ghatanaya karanu læbuve da ohuge bharakaruta sæbævinma api balayak pævaruvemu. namut ohu ghatanaya sambandhayen simava ikmava noya yutuya. niyata vasayenma ohu udav karanu labanneki
